docblock.description: Ultimate Tag Cloud Widget
Ultimate Tag Cloud Widget
Configuration class for the widget.
Title text of the widget.
How the result should be ordered Default value: name Valid values: random, name, slug, id, color, count
The smallest possible size Default: 10
The greatest possible size Default: 30
Maximum number of tags to display Default: 45
Which taxonomy to show tags from Default: post_tag
If the order of tags should be shown in reverse order Default: false
Which coloring strategy to use Default: none Valid values: none, random, set, span
CSS letter-spacing value (in pixels) Default: normal
CSS word-spacing value (in pixels) Default: normal
CSS text-transform value Default: none Valid values: lowercase, uppercase, capitalize
If sorting should be applied case sensitive Default: false
How many posts a term needs to have to be shown in the cloud Default: 1
How the $tags_list should be used Default: exclude Valid values: exclude, include
If the title attribute should be added to links in the cloud Default: true
If links should be styled with underline decoration Default: default Valid values: yes, no, default
If links should be styled as bold Default: default Valid values: yes, no, default
If links should be styled as italic Default: default Valid values: yes, no, default
Background color for links Default: transparent Valid values: A hexadecimal color
Border style for links Default: none Valid values: none, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset
Border width for links Default: 0
Border color for links Default: none Valid values: A hexadecimal color
If links should be decorated with underline decoration in their hover state Default: default Valid values: yes, no, default
If links should be styled as bold in their hover state Default: default Valid values: yes, no, default
If links should be styled as italic in their hover state Default: default Valid values: yes, no, default
Background color for links in their hover state Default: transparent Valid values: A hexadecimal color
Text color for links in their hover state Default: default Valid values: A hexadecimal color
Border style for links in their hover state Default: none Valid values: none, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset
Border width for links in their hover state Default: 0
Border color for links in their hover state Default: none Valid values: A hexadecimal color
CSS margin between tags Default: auto
If debug output should be included Default: false
How many days old a post needs to be to be included in tag size calculation Default: 0
CSS line-height for the tags Default: inherit
Separator between tags Default: (a space character)
Prefix before each tag Default: (empty string)
Suffix after each tag Default: (empty string)
If the widget title should be shown Default: true
An array of post type names to to include posts from in tag size calculation Default: [ post ]
A list of term IDs to be included or excluded.
docblock.long-description: Inclusion or exclusion is determined by $tags_list_type Default: [] (an empty array)

docblock.description: Which color value to start from in color calculation.
docblock.long-description: This is the color that the smallest tag will get. Default: (an empty string)

docblock.description: Which color value to end at in color calculation.
docblock.long-description: This is the color that the biggest tag will get. Default: (an empty string)

docblock.description: Which authors to include posts from.
docblock.long-description: An empty array will include all authors Default: [] (an empty array)

docblock.description: A set of colors to randomly select from when coloring the tags Default: [] (an empty array)
If the current user is authenticated.
Text to display before the widget.
docblock.long-description: The default value for this setting will probably be determined by the theme Default: (an empty string)

docblock.description: Text to display after the widget.
docblock.long-description: The default value for this setting will probably be determined by the theme Default: (an empty string)

docblock.description: Text to display before the widget title.
docblock.long-description: The default value for this setting will probably be determined by the theme Default: (an empty string)

docblock.description: Text to display after the widget title.
docblock.long-description: The default value for this setting will probably be determined by the theme Default: (an empty string)

property.name: $options
property.default: array('title' => 'Tag Cloud', 'order' => 'name', 'size_from' => 10, 'size_to' => 30, 'max' => 45, 'taxonomy' => 'post_tag', 'reverse' => false, 'color' => 'none', 'letter_spacing' => 'normal', 'word_spacing' => 'normal', 'text_transform' => 'none', 'case_sensitive' => false, 'minimum' => 1, 'tags_list_type' => 'exclude', 'show_title' => true, 'link_underline' => 'default', 'link_bold' => 'default', 'link_italic' => 'default', 'link_bg_color' => 'transparent', 'link_border_style' => 'none', 'link_border_width' => 0, 'link_border_color' => 'none', 'hover_underline' => 'default', 'hover_bold' => 'default', 'hover_italic' => 'default', 'hover_bg_color' => 'transparent', 'hover_color' => 'default', 'hover_border_style' => 'none', 'hover_border_width' => 0, 'hover_border_color' => 'none', 'tag_spacing' => 'auto', 'debug' => false, 'days_old' => 0, 'line_height' => 'inherit', 'separator' => ' ', 'prefix' => '', 'suffix' => '', 'show_title_text' => true, 'post_type' => array('post'), 'tags_list' => array(), 'color_span_to' => '', 'color_span_from' => '', 'authors' => array(), 'color_set' => array(), 'before_widget' => '', 'after_widget' => '', 'before_title' => '', 'after_title' => '')
